description: Verify the infra-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run infra-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide an infra-scoring scorecard with 7 issues across CI Pipeline, Environment Management, Monitoring.
expectations: Run infra-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 7 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run infra-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (no CI pipeline), HIGH (no env validation), MEDIUM (no health endpoint).
tests.pass_criteria: CI pipeline fixed first (CRITICAL), then env validation (HIGH, Environment Mgmt 12% weight), then health endpoint (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run infra-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/ci-cd.md` and applies the "GitHub Actions CI Workflow" pattern. Fix creates `.github/workflows/ci.yml` with parallel lint/typecheck/test jobs.

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run infra-fix to apply the Env Validation with Zod fix and verify results
tests.setup: Apply the "Env Validation with Zod" fix from `env-monitoring.md`.
expectations: Run infra-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: env.ts schema matches .env.example keys, app starts without env errors
tests.pass_criteria: Skill confirms Zod schema covers all required env vars. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run infra-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 40/100 (grade D). Apply fixes for 3 CRITICAL + 2 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
